response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("Age", "low", "Being a young adult generally indicates lower risk of recidivism."),
    ("Gender", "low", "Gender alone does not significantly predict recidivism."),
    ("Race", "medium", "Research shows that Black individuals may face higher risk due to systemic factors, but individual circumstances are more important."),
    ("Prior Arrests", "medium", "One prior arrest indicates a moderate risk of recidivism."),
    ("Conviction Status", "low", "Not having a conviction reduces the risk as it suggests this is a first-time offender."),
    ("Height and Weight", "low", "Physical attributes have minimal impact on recidivism risk."),
    ("Marital Status", "low", "Being unmarried does not significantly predict recidivism."),
    ("Living Arrangement", "low", "Living alone is not a significant predictor of recidivism."),
    ("Education Level", "medium", "Having a high school diploma but not enrolled in college suggests a moderate risk, as education can impact employment opportunities and future criminal involvement."),
    ("Employment History", "low", "Holding one job during the year is generally a protective factor against recidivism."),
    ("Substance Use", "low", "No drug use in the past four years is a strong protective factor against recidivism."),
    ("Mental Health", "high", "Persistent feelings of sadness or depression can indicate a higher risk of recidivism, as mental health issues may contribute to criminal behavior."),
    ("Family Background", "medium", "Growing up in an urban area with a single parent and siblings could suggest a moderate risk due to potential exposure to adversity and instability."),
    ("Religious Beliefs", "low", "Belief in God does not significantly predict recidivism.")
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 65
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 19-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 8 inches and weighs 145 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a high school diploma and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and most of the time during the past month he has felt so down in the dumps that nothing could cheer him up. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
